com.jonlatane.composer.scoredisplay
Class StaffSpec.HorizontalStaffSpec

java.lang.Object
  com.jonlatane.composer.scoredisplay.StaffSpec.HorizontalStaffSpec
Enclosing class:
StaffSpec
public static class StaffSpec.HorizontalStaffSpec
extends java.lang.Object

A HorizontalStaffSpec defines the widths of the areas for drawing accidentals, noteheads, time signature changes and key signature changes within a StaffDelta.

Author:
Jon Latane

Field Detail

DEFAULT

public static final StaffSpec.HorizontalStaffSpec DEFAULT
The default value defines always-present padding between accidentals, noteheads, time signatures, and key signatures. Since these margins are to the left, the area to draw noteheads with nothing in the other areas is a 10 pixel margen on each side.
